mapper.select: SELECT @rowno := @rowno + 1 AS rowno, r.* FROM (SELECT original_price - price sub_price, pid, category.cid, category.name cname, brand.bid, brand.name bname, product.name, description, original_price, price, img_url, inventory, sales_volume FROM product JOIN category ON product.cid = category.cid JOIN brand ON product.bid = brand.bid ORDER BY 1 DESC) r, (SELECT @rowno := 0) t WHERE @rowno < 4

SELECT pid, category.cid, category.name cname, brand.bid, brand.name bname, product.name, description, original_price, price, img_url, inventory, sales_volume FROM product JOIN category ON product.cid = category.cid JOIN brand ON product.bid = brand.bid WHERE pid = #{pid}
